attributes.action: lower the requirements for the Highly Skilled Migrant Program.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The immigration system in this country is much too strict for skilled workers travelling from developed countries. We're crying out for skilled graduates to contribute to the economy and the Highly Skilled Migrant Program's criteria set the bar too high. Its very difficult to get in unless you're a young doctor or an MBA.

Let's make the UK a world leader in every field by encouraging skilled people with talent we need by widening the scope of the Highly Skilled Migrants Program.
